alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 19 at 3:42PM HST until April 20 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY THROUGH TONIGHT FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... .A front moving through the area tonight will produce a wintry mix of light snow and chance of freezing rain over the Big Island Summits. Winds will also be gusty at times with wind gusts as high as 55 mph possible. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Wintry mix with up to 1 inch of additional snow possible and chance of freezing rain. Gusty winds with winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility at times, with periods of zero visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities and use caution while driving.
